dataprotection.heading: Data Protection
content: Your privacy is important to us. At Integreat Passau, we prioritize the protection of your personal information.
Our data protection policies are designed to ensure that your data is handled securely and confidentially.
We only collect the necessary information to facilitate optimal use of our services. If you have further questions about data protection, please contact us.

about.heading: About Integreat
content: Welcome to Integreat Passau! Our web application provides a variety of resources and information about daily life and living in the city of Passau.
Discover useful articles on various topics, from practical tips to current events. Our mission is to provide you with a user-friendly platform to enhance your life in Passau.

openSourceLicences.heading: Open-Source-Licences
openSourceLicences.introduction: This application uses several open-source libraries to provide its functionality. Below is a list of these libraries along with their respective licenses:

noNews: There are no news at this time.
noEvents: There are no events at this time.
title: Title
question: Question
titleError: Title must be at least 10 characters long.
questionError: Question must be at least 20 characters long.
pleaseLogIn: Please log in to see this site
noArticleContent: No article content in the JSON-File.
noQuestions: There are no questions at this time
